summary: Admin UI frontend change: add max-height and scrolling to category dropdowns on the Admin Products page and Add/Edit Product modal (limit visible items to ~10) without impacting other pages; preserve existing :root CSS variables in index.css.
architectural_notes: Do not remove/modify/overwrite the :root CSS custom properties block in index.css; append any new CSS styles only below it.
Scope is frontend-only and must not affect other pages/designs; use new CSS styling if needed to avoid impacting other category lists.
known_issues: Admin category dropdowns overflow when many categories exist because there is no height limit or scroll in dropdown menus (Admin Products filter and Add/Edit Product modal).

existing_features.title: Add an opt-in way to style the dropdown menu container for SafeSelect so specific callers can apply a max-height and scrolling without changing default behavior of other selects.

Apply the new SafeSelect dropdown content styling to the Admin Products page category filter dropdown so it displays at most 10 category items at once and becomes vertically scrollable when there are more than 10 categories.
Apply the same max-height (10 items) + vertical scrolling behavior to the category selection dropdown inside the Add/Edit Product modal (ProductUpsertModal).

Create new, admin-specific CSS styles to implement the scrollable dropdown menu (max-height, overflow-y) and a clean scrollbar that matches the existing admin theme; ensure smooth touch scrolling with momentum and preserve accessibility. Append styles without modifying the existing :root CSS custom properties block in frontend/src/index.css.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add max-height (10 items) + vertical scroll to admin category dropdowns (Admin Products filter + Add/Edit Product modal), with accessible keyboard/screen reader support and mobile touch-friendly scrolling; do not modify :root CSS variables in index.css.

projectName: Admin category dropdown: limit height to 10 items with vertical scroll (Products filter + Product modal)
